typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	partdistFrom as string
}
source(output(
		organizationid as string,
		ntt_identifier as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		createdby as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_breathingspacestatustypeid as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceStatusTypeId as string,
		strNTTName as string,
		blIsTruncate as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/references-bss/breathingspacestatustype') ~> sourceODS
dcolSQL alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowSQL
FilterODS select(mapColumn(
		batch_id = intBatchId,
		partdist,
		isValid = blIsValid,
		modifiedon = tsModifiedOn,
		createdon = tsCreatedOn,
		ntt_breathingspacestatustypeid = strNTTBreathingSpaceStatusTypeId,
		ntt_name = strNTTName,
		isTruncate = blIsTruncate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectODS
SelectODS derive(ntt_name = coalesce(ntt_name, 'unknown')) ~> dcolSQL
sourceODS filter(partdist >= toDate($partdistFrom)) ~> FilterODS
AlterRowSQL sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ntt_breathingspacestatustypeid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkSQL
